creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure standing in 3/4 pose, holding papers or cards in PL hand and a whip like object in PR hand; empty banderole behind man's upper torso; rocks and weeds at feet
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription

inscribed in plate monogram and date in plate, at bottom: [MQD / 1587
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Peasant in Slashed Clothes
